person.persName: Kenaz F. Hargis (Owsley County, KY, trader)

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, trader and attorney. Son of John Hargis and Elizabeth Weddlington Hargis. Married to Elizabeth A. McGlassin Hargis on February 19, 1857. Father of Amanda H. Hargis. Student in Jackson, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Admitted to the bar in 1856. Merchant with W. P. Hill until c1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Owsley County in 1860. Trader in Owsley County in 1863.
